QuestData.Title: Plucking Parts
QuestData.Description:
Oh, no... I've made a huge mistake.
Harleen entrusted me with the famed Feather-Plucker 3300, a phenomenal invention of her very own!
I was planning to pluck roc feathers in the cave south of here for her research, but the harpies ambushed me and it broke into pieces as I was running out.
Please retrieve the parts! They're probably strewn about like shed scales on the cave floor.
I can put it back together. Definitely. Well, probably.
QuestData.RewardText:
Oh, thank the flights!
I've come to like the professor, and this could have spelled the end of our new friendship!
